title: How to Make Pineappleade

steps.headline: Pare and slice some very ripe pineapples.
Cut the slices into small pieces.
Put them with all their juice into a large pitcher.
Pour on boiling water, allowing a small half pint to each pineapple.
Cover the pitcher and let it stand until quite cool, occasionally pressing down the pineapple with a spoon.
Set the pitcher for a while in ice.
steps.description: Strain the infusion into another vessel and transfer it to tumblers, putting into each glass some more sugar and a bit of ice. This beverage is delicious.

text: Pare and slice some very ripe pineapples.  Cut the slices into small pieces.  Put them with all their juice into a large pitcher. Sprinkle generously with fine sugar. Pour on boiling water, allowing a small half pint to each pineapple.  Cover the pitcher and let it stand until quite cool, occasionally pressing down the pineapple with a spoon.  Set the pitcher for a while in ice. Strain the infusion into another vessel and transfer it to tumblers, putting into each glass some more sugar and a bit of ice. This beverage is delicious.
